attributes.action: Resigning MPs to lose their seat in Parliament
attributes.additional_details: The independent party ,Hammond and 50 others have resigned  since April. If I didn't do what my employer wanted I would be sacked.no wages , no retirement fund, no severence pay, and on the dole. MPs should not be immune from any of those things.
attributes.background: A lot of MPs are  self serving instead of honouring there constituencies wishes. MPs are paid by the tax payer to do their bidding.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments, this includes petitions asking for people to lose their jobs. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242193
